TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TableCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TableCallback(tableData As ICollection)
type TableCallback = delegate of ICollection -> unit

param.name: tableData
param.span: 要从提供者检索的数据。

span.span: The data to retrieve from the provider.

summary.span: 引用在从提供者中检索表数据时要调用的方法。

span.span: References the method to call when retrieving table data from a provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Web 部件控件实现接口并可作为 Web 部件连接中，使用者或转换器中的提供程序必须检索和处理提供程序中的表数据。When a Web Parts control implements the interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the table data from the provider. 委托表示要用于处理提供程序数据调用的方法。The delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data. 方法包含委托参数。The method contains a delegate parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含一个名为 Web 部件控件`TableProviderWebPart`可用作表的窗体中的数据提供程序。The following code example contains a Web Parts control named `TableProviderWebPart` that serves as a provider of data in the form of a table. 该控件包含的一个实现方法，用于接收类型的参数。The control includes an implementation of the method, which receives a parameter of type . 此方法调用所表示的方法委托传递表数据。This method calls the method represented by the delegate passing the table data. [!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableprovider.vb#1)] 在中`OnPreRender`方法中，使用者调用`GetTableData`中`TableProviderWebPart`，并将传递其`GetTableData`方法作为委托调用使用表数据，如下面的代码示例中所示。In the `OnPreRender` method, the consumer calls `GetTableData` in `TableProviderWebPart` and passes its `GetTableData` method as the delegate to call with the table data, as shown in the following code example. [!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableconsumerwebpart.vb#2)] 两个控件和连接包含在 Web 页中，如下面的示例中所示。The two controls and the connection are included in a Web page, as shown in the following example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/TableConnection.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/TableConnection.aspx#3)]
